channel.title: Huh? What? Wtf!?! Help!
channel.description: OK here's my problem, Attacking is very slow on my server...I've coded way too much to just start over. The attacking has a delay, idk if it's my computer or if there's something actually wrong that i can fix...but I've tried changing the wepdelay and pkingdelay on all weapons to 1! And STILL it's extremely slow, like a lag i think. But it only happens when an npc or player is attacked...Lag only during combat. If anyone could help I'd would Extremely appreciate it! Please Help![br][size=1]Posted on: September 10, 2007, 08:09:22 PM[/size][hr]sry for dp but i really need help

item.title: Huh? What? Wtf!?! Help!
item.dc:creator: @Str3ngthzzz Str3ngthzzz
item.description:
@Str3ngthzzz wrote:

OK here’s my problem, Attacking is very slow on my server…I’ve coded way too much to just start over. The attacking has a delay, idk if it’s my computer or if there’s something actually wrong that i can fix…but I’ve tried changing the wepdelay and pkingdelay on all weapons to 1! And STILL it’s extremely slow, like a lag i think. But it only happens when an npc or player is attacked…Lag only during combat. If anyone could help I’d would Extremely appreciate it! Please Help![br][size=1]Posted on: September 10, 2007, 08:09:22 PM[/size][hr]sry for dp but i really need help
